title: Homemade Greek Yogurt Recipe
full_text:
Homemade Greek Yogurt Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
15 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
15 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
container (6 oz)
plain yogurt
Directions
Line a fine-mesh strainer with a cheesecloth or large coffee filter and set it over a large bowl. Spoon yogurt into prepared strainer, transfer to refrigerator, and allow whey to drip out until yogurt has thickened to your desired level. Transfer strained yogurt to sealed container and keep refrigerated. You can drink whey or use it in some baked goods or other preparations.
Serious Eats / Vicky Wasik
Special Equipment
Fine-mesh strainer
, cheesecloth or large coffee filter
Make-Ahead and Storage
The strained yogurt can be refrigerated for up to two weeks.
